db:abstract.db:para: This type was introduced in Qt 5.1.

db:listitem.db:para: ComboBoxStyle is part of Styling Controls

db:section.db:title: background : Component
db:section.db:para: This defines the background of the button.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] control : ComboBox
db:section.db:para: The ComboBox this style is attached to.

db:section.db:title: dropDownButtonWidth : int
db:section.db:para: The size of the drop down button when the combobox is editable.

db:section.db:title: [since QtQuick.Controls.Styles 1.3] font : font
db:section.db:para: This property was introduced in QtQuick.Controls.Styles 1.3.

db:section.db:title: label : Component
db:section.db:para: This defines the label of the button.

db:section.db:title: padding group
db:section.db:para: This grouped property holds the top, left, right and bottom padding.

db:section.db:title: [since QtQuick.Controls.Styles 1.2] renderType : enumeration
db:section.db:para: Override the default rendering type for the control.
The default value is platform dependent.
This property was introduced in QtQuick.Controls.Styles 1.2.

db:section.db:title: [since QtQuick.Controls.Styles 1.3] selectedTextColor : color
db:section.db:para: The highlighted text color, used in selections.
This property was introduced in QtQuick.Controls.Styles 1.3.

db:section.db:title: [since QtQuick.Controls.Styles 1.3] selectionColor : color
db:section.db:para: The text highlight color, used behind selections.
This property was introduced in QtQuick.Controls.Styles 1.3.

db:section.db:title: [since QtQuick.Controls.Styles 1.3] textColor : color
db:section.db:para: This property was introduced in QtQuick.Controls.Styles 1.3.
